column4: A code that the researcher assigns to the experiment or study.
The variables that are measured during the experiment and, if applicable, the molecules that are the focus of study.
The measurements applied (e.g. differential gene expression, presence/absence, etc.).
List the names of molecules that are the main focus of study (e.g. genes, proteins, protein complexes).
Treatments or conditions that are defined by the experimenter (e.g. treatments, genotypes, conditions, etc.).
If Other was selected in Experimental Factors, list any other factor types that were used in this Dataset.
